project.name: ${application.display.name}
project.description: ${application.display.name} runs as a Java based desktop application. It utilizes OGC services to support both tile and feature based animations. ${application.display.name} provides the analytic capability to temporally and geospatially manipulate data layers created from single or multiple data sources in a 3-dimensional representation of the earth. It has the ability to handle millions of features that can be pulled from multiple sources.

organization.name: BIT Systems, Inc., CACI International Inc's National and Cyber Solutions (NCS) Group
